# website/src/components

Contains Astro components for the website's UI layer, specifically the navigation bar with theme switching and external link handling.

## Contents

[Nav.astro](./Nav.astro) — Fixed top navigation bar with home/features/docs links, GitHub link, and dark/light theme toggle using Tailwind `dark:` classes.

## Props Interface

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `base` | `string` | `''` |
| `githubUrl` | `string` | `'https://github.com/lguzzon/runcmd'` |

## Internal Computed Values

- `normalizedBase` — empty string if `base === '/'`, otherwise `base` unchanged
- `homeHref` — `${normalizedBase}/#top`
- `featuresHref` — `${normalizedBase}/#features`
- `docsHref` — `${normalizedBase}/docs/#docs`

## Rendered Structure

- Fixed `nav` element with `backdrop-blur-lg`, transparent white/dark background, border bottom
- Logo SVG (terminal icon)
- Nav links: Features, Docs
- GitHub icon link with `aria-label="GitHub"`
- Theme toggle button with `[data-theme-toggle]` attribute and `aria-pressed` state
- Icons: sun (dark mode), moon (light mode) with hover transitions

## Stack

- Framework: Astro
- Styling: Tailwind CSS (dark mode support)
- Icons: Inline SVG
